snippet: The United States is sending an additional 75 military personnel, as well as equipment and vehicles, to the Sinai Peninsula.
abstract: Pentagon announces deployment of 75 more American soldiers and equipment to reinforce international peacekeeping mission in Sinai Peninsula after six are hurt in bombing.
lead_paragraph: The United States is sending an additional 75 military personnel, as well as equipment and vehicles, to the Sinai Peninsula.

headline.main: Egypt: U.S. to Bolster Force in Sinai
headline.print_headline: Middle East; Egypt: U.S. to Bolster Force in Sinai
